definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

sentences.english: He said he could not bear such internal sabotage any longer.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他再也不能忍受這種內部的陰謀活動了。

sentences.english: No longer would his darling’s candle be extinguished by his useless tears.
sentences.chinese: 寶貝女兒的蠟燭再也沒有被他無用的眼淚熄滅過。

sentences.english: Toto I've got a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
sentences.chinese: 託託，我有一種感覺我們再也葷芻了家了。

sentences.english: He could not get a hare again; instead he was laughed at by the people of Song.
sentences.chinese: 兔子他再也得不到，他自己反倒被宋國人嘲笑了。

sentences.english: From that day forward he never bothered me again.
sentences.chinese: 從那天起，他再也沒找過我的麻煩。

sentences.english: But since then, Zhang never came to Lushan Mountain any more.
sentences.chinese: 但從那以後，張學良再也沒上過廬山。

sentences.english: "I know he'll never be able to live unsupported, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 銛“我知道，他是再也不可能自理生活了，”她說。

sentences.english: I think that in this life, I never see who can come to fish with the branches of Salix.
sentences.chinese: 我想，這輩子，我再也見不到誰能用柳樹枝來釣魚了。

sentences.english: From then on, the sheep of this shepherd hadn't been thieved by the wolf any more.
sentences.chinese: 從此，那個牧民的羊就再也沒有被家狼叼走過了。
他再也聽不到腳步聲了。

sentences.english: Ever since, the One-Thousand-Angle Light has been out of sight for 37 years.
sentences.chinese: 自此以後，千角燈就在37年間再也沒有出現過。

sentences.english: Neither the captain, the first mate, nor the second mate ever worked again.
sentences.chinese: 船長，大副和二副從此以後再也不一起工作了。

sentences.english: I can't move any farther; I'm done up.
sentences.chinese: 我再也挪不動了，我精疲力竭了。

sentences.english: It can’t eat anymore, it is even difficult to move, and fish still swims in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 再也喫不下一條魚，甚至連走都走不動了。

sentences.english: I could not hold my calmness any more and shouted at him irritatingly.
sentences.chinese: 我再也無法平靜，眼睛噴了火，逼視着他。

sentences.english: I never met Julia again after that, which was a pity.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後我再也沒有見到朱莉葉，真是遺憾。

definition: to be dead/not to be, or cease to exist
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
in the end/after all is said and done
no thanks (used to politely but informally decline)
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
